title: Landon Snow and the Auctor's Kingdom
description: Along with his sisters, Landon Snow has fallen through a trapdoor, escaped a perilous pursuit of colossal chess pieces, and is now hurtling down into the magic and mayhem of Wonderwood. Are the Snow children too late to save their friends? As the evil Arcan army and the fiery dragon Volucer Ignis battle the helpless people of Wonderwood, Landon plans a desperate attack. How many lives will be lost until victory is gained? Will Landon Snow take an escape route, or will he have the courage to lead his friends into the safety of the Auctor's Kingdom?
author: R.K. Mortenson
